name: Hitcone
description:
Description

The world is a tough place, and it's even harder for a traffic cone who needs to provide for its family. Control an assassin traffic cone and hunt down targets with unique hats. Every kill rewards cash that will reduce over time. Quickly kill all ten targets to earn enough cash to get your family off the streets!

This game was developed during VGDC Halloween Game Jam 2018 and the following summer.

Game Instructions
  • WASD to move
  • Space to jump
  • Left click to attack
    • Attacking on the ground performs a ground attack
    • Attacking in the air performs an aerial attack
Credits
  • Joseph Dasilva - Gameplay programming, UI design, level design
